column1: The Great Hall of Osgiliath was the joint throne room of Isildur and Anárion in the city of Osgiliath. Although the two brothers kept separate houses in Minas Ithil (Isildur) and Minas Anor (Anárion)
column2: their thrones were set side by side in the Great Hall.

column1: Presumably after the deaths of both brothers the early Kings of Gondor used the Great Hall as their throne room. However
column2: subsequent to the Great Plague of  Osgiliath became largely deserted
column3: and in  King Tarondor (King of Gondor) removed the Kings House permanently to Minas Anor.
